In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
using WordArrays
using Formatting

function wrap_string(s::AbstractString; max_text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    char_count = 0

    for word in words
        if char_count + length(word) + 1 < max_text_width
            char_count += length(word)
        else
            char_count = length(word)
            print("\n")
        end
        print("$word ")
    end
    return 0
end

wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Cras sollicitudin mattis lorem, at tempor eros viverra in. Vestibulum eu mattis neque, sit amet rutrum lectus. Nunc nec sapien ac mauris consequat placerat sit amet quis urna.", 20)
```
